name: Human Deaths
description: Annual number of human fatalities caused by this animal species (higher score = more dangerous to humans)

name: Hair Density
description: Density and coverage of fur/hair on the animal's body (higher score = denser fur/more coverage)

name: Top Speed
description: Maximum recorded speed of the animal (higher score = faster movement capability)

name: Lifespan
description: Average or maximum lifespan in years (higher score = longer-lived species)

name: Population
description: Current global population size and conservation status (higher score = larger/more stable populations)

name: Habitat Extent
description: Geographic range and area of habitat distribution (higher score = wider distribution across regions)

name: Relative Strength
description: Physical strength relative to body size and weight (higher score = stronger pound-for-pound)

name: Consumption by Humans
description: Degree to which humans consume this species as food globally (higher score = more heavily consumed)
